original_text: Some people do what their weak human thoughts want them to do. They think about the things that will make themselves happy. But people who live with God's Spirit as their guide think about what will make God's Spirit happy.
korean_text: 육신을 따르는 자는 육신의 일을, 영을 따르는 자는 영의 일을 생각하나니

sentences.original_text: Some people do what their weak human thoughts want them to do
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들은 그들의 약한 인간적 생각이 원하는 대로 행동합니다

sentences.original_text: They think about the things that will make themselves happy
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신을 행복하게 만들 것들을 생각합니다

sentences.original_text: But people who live with God's Spirit as their guide
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님의 영을 인도자로 삼고 사는 사람들은

sentences.original_text: think about what will make God's Spirit happy
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 영을 기쁘게 할 것들을 생각합니다
